p: α-amylase and α-glucosidase inhibitory studies demonstrated that Pulicaria inuloides essential oil caused a concentration-dependent reduction in the percentage of inhibition of α-amylase and α-glucosidase. The highest concentration of Pulicaria inuloides (250 μg/mL) showed a maximum inhibition of nearly 85.50% and 86.52% of α-amylase and α-glucosidase, respectively [ 67].
